entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
